name: Mainland Aviation College
about: Mainland Aviation College, a division of Mainland Air, is a NZQA-approved Flight Training Establishment based at Dunedin International Airport, New Zealand. Established in 1991, the college offers a Diploma in Aviation and boasts a fleet of 12 training aircraft, including Piper Chieftains and Cessnas. With highly qualified instructors who have over 50 years of combined experience, students gain valuable training in various weather conditions and real-world scenarios. The college provides comprehensive courses, including Mountain & Strip Flying, tail-wheel experience, and Instrument Rating. Many graduates have secured jobs with major airlines such as Air New Zealand, Air India, and IndiGO. Mainland Aviation College is committed to producing talented pilots, helping meet the global demand for skilled aviators. Start your aviation career with us and gain the skills and experience needed to succeed in the industry.
